verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
Redeemed, redeemed,
His child, and forever,
I am.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Redeemed how I love
to proclaim it!
Redeemed by the
blood of the Lamb;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Redeemed throâ€™ His infinite mercy,
His child, and forever,
I am.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
I know that the light
of His presence
With me doth
continually dwell.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I think of my
blessed Redeemer,
I think of Him
all the day long;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
I sing,
for I cannot be silent;
His love is the theme
of my song.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
I know I shall see
in His beauty
The King in whose law
I delight;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Who lovingly guardeth
my footsteps,
And giveth me songs
in the night.
